biotools.summary: PCRsetup is a tool for planning PCR and qPCR reactions, mixing solutions. The higher quality of primers is help to save PCR efficiency at changing PCR conditions. PCR reaction can set up in room temperature and performed without hot-start enzymes.

bioschemas.name: PCRsetup
